channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pro-Rel in the USA: USL Announces Plans To Launch 'Premier' League In 2028
item.description: The United Soccer League revealed the name of its new Division One setup Tuesday morning, announcing that it will be called "USL Premier", with a targ...

item.title: 2026 Men's NCAA Tournament Projections: Purdue Slips, UNC Climbs and More
item.description: FOX Sports bracket forecaster Mike DeCourcy delivers his latest men's NCAA tournament bracket predictions.

item.title: 2025-26 Men's March Madness Odds: Arizona Passes Michigan as New Favorite
item.description: A new squad has emerged as the favorite to win the men's hoops NCAA title. Here are the latest odds.

item.title: Kansas City Chiefs Coach Andy Reid on Offseason: 'I'm Going to Fix the Problem'
item.description: Coming off a 6-11 season, Kansas City Chiefs head coach Andy Reid vowed that he's going to "fix" the team's problems.

item.title: 2026 World Baseball Classic: Arenado Switches From USA To Puerto Rico
item.description: The latest news, announcements and updates ahead of the 2026 World Baseball Classic.

item.title: Payton: Nix was 'predisposed' to inevitable injury
item.description: Sean Payton said at his season-ending news conference Tuesday that Denver Broncos quarterback Bo Nix had a preexisting ankle condition that made a fra...

item.title: McCarthy 'definitely' would like Rodgers to return
item.description: New Steelers coach Mike McCarthy said he would like to see Aaron Rodgers return as the team's starting quarterback in 2026.

item.title: Bills promote Brady to head coach on 5-year deal
item.description: The Bills have promoted offensive coordinator Joe Brady to head coach on a five-year deal, the team announced Tuesday.

item.title: Mensah, Duke settle dispute as QB eyes Miami
item.description: Darian Mensah and Duke have agreed to a settlement of their dispute that will clear the way for the quarterback to transfer to another school.

item.title: OC out as Jets' revamp continues, sources say
item.description: The Jets are parting ways with offensive coordinator Tanner Engstrand, sources told ESPN on Tuesday.
